src_original: lakṣaṣoḍaśakodvedhamasaṃkhyaṃ vāyumaṇḍalam // VAkK_3.45 //  apāmekādaśodvedhaṃ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ /
tgt_original: lakṣaṣoḍaśakodvedhamasaṃkhyaṃ vāyumaṇḍalam ||  apāmekādaśodvedhaṃ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ |

src_original: tiryak trīṇi sahasrāṇi sārdhaṃ śatacatuṣṭayam /  lakṣadvādaśakaṃ caiva jalakāñcanamaṇḍalam // VAkK_3.47 //  samantatastu triguṇaṃ tatra merūryugandharaḥ /
lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca tatra tu /  jambūdvīpo dvisāhasrastripārśvaḥ śakaṭākṛtiḥ // VAkK_3.53 //
tgt_original: jambūdvīpo dvisāhasrastriṣārśvaḥ śakaṭākṛtiḥ ||  sārdhaṃ triyojanaṃ tvekaṃ prāgvideho'
